info.name: Moe background/character pack
info.description: Compatible with many other MyAnimeList Stylish themes. Build your own moe layout on MyAnimeList pages with a variety of moe characters and moe-transformed characters, like in the screenshot! Comes with 30 default choices of popular characters and backgrounds to mix and match under Customize Setings, or you can use your own!
info.additionalInfo:
More backgrounds can be found here: http://imgur.com/a/P9BFr
More renders (characters) can be found here, without watermarks: http://imgur.com/a/ydViG
You can paste the URLs from the albums on this theme's page
